attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The idea of Taxing, Air travellers to save the planet is sinister and wrong. a lot of people work hard for a living and struggle to get away for holidays abroard. flight pricing is already here, with the high level of taxation on fuel. 
It is an unfair tax on those who want to get away after working hard for a living, and poorer people who will not be able to afford an enjoyment in life.

Please Mr Blair - forget about This Tax

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
